ACTIVATED_ABILITY.RESOLUTION_TIME_ACTION: local token_count = 1 local index = math.random(0, 1) if token_count > 0 then if index == 0 then MTG():PutTokensIntoPlay( "TOKEN_SAPROLING_1_1_277461", token_count, EffectController() ) else MTG():PutTokensIntoPlay( "TOKEN_SAPROLING_1_1_GARRUK_29", token_count, EffectController() ) end end
